item.title: Direct Unlearning Optimization for Robust and Safe Text-to-Image Models
item.description: Direct Unlearning Optimization (DUO) robustly removes unsafe content from text-to-image models by using paired image data and output-preserving regularization, effectively defending against adversaria…

item.title: Polyhedral Complex Derivation from Piecewise Trilinear Networks
item.description: This paper presents a novel method for analytically extracting meshes from neural implicit surface networks using trilinear interpolation, offering theoretical insights and practical efficiency.
